a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Share of urban vs. rural population using safely managed
Share of the urban versus population using a safely managed sanitation service; that is, excreta safely disposed of in situ or treated
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP)
